lead_paragraph: Zach Lund edged his fellow American Eric Bernotas to win the skeleton event on the first day of the Bobsleigh and Skeleton World Cup in Park City, Utah. Lund finished in 1 minute 38.41 seconds, beating Bernotas by .25 of a second. Lund has won the event in Park City two straight years. Michelle Kelly of Canada won the women’s event in 1:40.43.
